# include<map>
# include<set>
# include<queue>
# include<stack>
# include<deque>
# include<math.h>
# include<vector>
# include<bitset>
# include<stdio.h>
# include<ctype.h>
# include<iostream>
# include<stdlib.h>
# include<string.h>
# include<algorithm>
# define si size
# define er erase
# define sc scanf
# define be begin
# define fr first
# define se second
# define pr printf
# define pb push_back
# define mp make_pair
# define Int long long int
# define INF 100000000
using namespace std;
main()
{
//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
//freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
Int n,i,j,k,l,p,r,q,m,t;
char s[15];
while(1)
{
    sc("%s",s);
    if(s[0]=='#')return 0;
    l=strlen(s);
    n=0;
    for(i=0;i<l;i++)
    {
        n*=10;
        n+=(s[i]-48);
    }
    //pr("n=%lld ",n);
    k=0;
    p=9;
    q=1;
    t=1;
    while(k+(p*q)<n)
    {
        k+=(p*q);
        p*=10;
        q++;
        t*=10;
    }
    //pr("k=%lld p=%lld q=%lld ",k,p,q);
    l=0;
    r=p;
    while(l<r)
    {
        m=(l+r)/2;
        if(k+(m*q)<n)l=m+1;
        else r=m;
    }
    //pr("r=%lld ",r);
    if(k+r*q==n)pr("%lld\n",t-1+r);
    else pr("Impossible!\n");
}
return 0;
}
